      • getFullNamedEntities

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFullNamedEntities(CoreMap sentence)
        Returns:
        a List of Strings which are concatenated tokens forming a single named entity, with the suffix of the number of the head. For example "I went to New York." would return "NewYork-4".

      • printCorefChain

        public static void printCorefChain(Annotation document)
        Print the coreference link graph Each chain stores a set of mentions that link to each other, along with a method for getting the most representative mention Both sentence and token offsets start at 1!

      • findPOSInformation

        public static java.util.List<Literal> findPOSInformation(java.util.List<CoreLabel> tokens,
                                                         java.util.List<Literal> dependenciesList)
        returns a list of strings that add tense, number, etc. information about words in input ex. tense(PAST, Verb) number(SINGULAR, Noun) //TODO: I'm a monster! Refactor me
